ai-tha-ap31:1.2_0: while walking along I wandered about,
ai-tha-ap31:2.1_0: I realized the supreme state of grace.
ai-tha-ap31:2.4_0: I remember being with joined palms.
ai-tha-ap31:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap31:3.4_0: This is the fruit of a creepers.
ai-tha-ap31:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap31:4.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
ai-tha-ap31:4.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap31:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable V these verses.
ai-tha-ap31:6.1_0: The ninth section for one senior monks, the ninth part of the senior monks.
